request.description:
phone and mail (only one required)
(social_type - social_id) are both required

sending 2 keys 
social_type
social_id
both keys are required , if the user already registered with social media the user and his/hers access_token will sent back in response

activation key changed to activation_status
value == 0 (account is suspended)
value == 1 (account is activated)
value == 2 (account is pending activation)
value == 3 (provider account need to complete profile )
value == 4 (provider account need admin approval)
